chapter.text: 76|1|kya vyateet hua manushy par yug ka ek samay, jab vah koee vicharchit[1] vastu na tha
76|2|hamane hee paida kiya manushy ko mishrit (mile hue) veery[1] se, taaki usakee pareeksha len aur banaaya use sunane tatha dekhane vaala.
76|3|hamane use raah darsha dee.[1] (ab) vah chaahe to krtagy bane athava krtaghn.
76|4|nihsandeh, hamane taiyaar kee kaafiron (krtaghnon) ke lie zanjeer tatha tauq aur dahakatee agni.
76|5|nishchay sadaachaaree (krtagy) piyenge aise pyaale se jisamen kapoor mishrit hoga.
76|6|ye ek srot hoga, jisase allaah ke bhakt piyenge. use baha le jaayenge (jahaan chaahenge).
76|7|jo (sansaar mein) pooree karate rahe manotiyaan[1] aur darate rahe us din se[2] jisakee aapada chaaron or phailee huee hogee.
76|8|aur bhojan karaate rahe us (bhojan) ko prem karane ke baavajood, nirdhan, anaath aur bandee ko.
76|9|(apane man mein ye sochakar) ham tumhen bhojan karaate hain keval allaah kee prasannata ke lie. tumase nahin chaahate hain koee badala aur na koee krtagyata.
76|10|ham darate hain apane paalanahaar se, us din se, jo ati bheeshan tatha ghor hoga.
76|11|to bacha liya allaah ne unhen us din kee aapada se aur pradaan kar diya praphullata tatha prasannata.
76|12|aur unhen pratiphal diya unake dhairy ke badale svarg tatha reshamee vastr.
76|13|ve takiye lagaaye usamen takhton par baithe honge. na usamen dhoop dekhenge na kada sheet.
76|14|aur jhuke honge unapar us (svarg) ke saaye aur bas mein kiye honge usake phalon ke guchchhe poornatah.
76|15|tatha phiraaye jaayenge unapar chaandee ke bartan tatha pyaale jo sheeshon ke honge.
76|16|chaandee ke sheeshon ke, jo ek anumaan se bharenge.
76|17|aur pilaaye jaayenge usamen aise bhare pyaale, jisamen sonth milee hogee.
76|18|ye ek srot hai us (svarg) mein, jisaka naam salasabeel hai.
76|19|aur (seva ke lie) phir rahe honge unapar sadaavaasee baalak, jab tum unhen dekhoge, to unhen samajhoge ki bikhare hue motee hain.
76|20|tatha jab tum vahaan dekhoge, to dekhoge bada sukh tatha bhaaree raajy.
76|21|unake oopar reshamee hare maheen tatha dabeej vastr honge aur pahanaaye jaayenge unhen chaandee ke kangan aur pilaayega unhen unaka paalanahaar pavitr pey.
76|22|(tatha kaha jaayegaah) yahee hai tumhaare lie pratiphal aur tumhaare prayaas ka aadar kiya gaya.
76|23|vaastav mein, hamane hee utaara hai aapapar quraan thoda-thoda karake.
76|24|atah, aap dhairy se kaam len apane paalanahaar ke aadeshaanusaar aur baat na maanen, unamen se kisee paapee tatha krtaghn kee.
76|25|tatha smaran karen apane paalanahaar ke naam ka, praatah tatha sandhya (ke samay).
76|26|tatha raatri mein sajda karen usake samaksh aur usakee pavitrata ka varnan karen, raatri ke lambe samay tak.
76|27|vaastav mein, ye log moh rakhate hain sansaar se aur chhod rahe hain apane peechhe ek bhaaree din[1] ko.
76|28|hamane hee unhen paida kiya hai aur sudrdh kiye hain unake jod-band tatha jab ham chaahen badala den unake[1] jaise (doosaron ko).
76|29|nishchay ye (soorah) ek shiksha hai. atah, jo chaahe apane paalanahaar kee or (jaane kee) raah bana le.
76|30|aur tum allaah kee ichchha ke bina kuchh bhee nahin chaah sakate.[1] vaastav mein, allaah sab cheezon aur gunon ko jaanane vaala hai.
76|31|vah pravesh deta hai jise chaahe apanee daya mein aur atyaachaariyon ke lie usane taiyaar kee hai duhkhadaayee yaatana.
